channel.title: Comments on: Triple Chocolate Cheesecake with Salted Peanut Caramel

item.title: By: Cobes
item.dc:creator: Cobes
item.description: I was looking at both the original and this version of the cheesecake and I've concluded this one is so much better. I doubt the original really needs the meringue, ane the chocolate shavings and seashells look gorgeous... now to see if I can get the trouble-making caramel to work!
item.content:encoded: I was looking at both the original and this version of the cheesecake and I’ve concluded this one is so much better. I doubt the original really needs the meringue, ane the chocolate shavings and seashells look gorgeous… now to see if I can get the trouble-making caramel to work!

item.title: By: Nic@diningwithastud
item.dc:creator: Nic@diningwithastud
item.description: Gorgeous :D so decadent - love the shells on top too :)
